home-section3-title: We take communication between you and your guest one step towards the future
home-section3-text: We are a platform designed to take your guest's experience to the next level, linking their device to the most important attractions near your property through geolocation. We also connect your property to hundreds of commercial establishments.

home-section5-title: Let's talk about how we can transform your business!
about-who-we-are-description: We are a group of adventurous professionals delivering the best option for your visitors' rest. With this app, they can access all the relevant information about vacation spots.
about-technology-description: We have a cutting-edge technology platform with a user-friendly interface created by our team of of professionals, all leaders in their respective fields.
exclusive-service1-description: Build a digital board for your property announcements or instruction easy to update from anywhere.
exclusive-service2-description: In just a few easy steps cr√©ate a web site to promote your short-term-rental property.
exclusive-service3-description: The XploreitBNB solution helps you to go green with your short term rental becoming paperless. Bye bye promotional panflets and printed instructions.
xperience-title4: Why are we the best choice for you?
experience-section1-paragraph1: By using the XploreitBNB app, your guests will have access to exclusive and detailed information which will make their experience a highly recommended one.
experience-section1-paragraph2: Providing updated data to travelers, they will receive discounts and other benefits from local businesses such as services, activities, and recommendations from existing hosts nearby the place rented.
experience-section2-title: Join the Xploreitbnb community and experience a transformation in your business.
experience-section2-h5: You will receive personalized attention just like the visitors. You will shine with your rental, and it will be increasingly recommended.
